title: DevOps Engineer
description: <strong>About Ascendion</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Ascendion is a full-service digital engineering solutions company. We make and manage software platforms and products that power growth and deliver captivating experiences to consumers and employees.</li><li>Our engineering, cloud, data, experience design, and talent solution capabilities accelerate transformation and impact for enterprise clients.</li><li>Headquartered in New Jersey, our workforce of 6,000+ Ascenders delivers solutions from around the globe. Ascendion is built differently to engineer the next. Ascendion | Engineering to elevate life</li><li>We have a culture built on opportunity, inclusion, and a spirit of partnership. Come, change the world with us:</li><li>Build the coolest tech for world’s leading brands</li><li>Solve complex problems – and learn new skills</li><li>Experience the power of transforming digital engineering for Fortune 500 clients</li><li>Master your craft with leading training programs and hands-on experience</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Experience a community of change makers!</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Join a culture of high-performing innovators with endless ideas and a passion for tech. Our culture is the fabric of our company, and it is what makes us unique and diverse.</li><li>The way we share ideas, learning, experiences, successes, and joy allows everyone to be their best at Ascendion.</li><li>Position Details: </li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Client: Airlines</strong><p><br></p><strong>Job Title: .NET Developer</strong><p><br></p><strong>Duration: 06 months possible extension</strong><p><br></p><strong>Location: Fully Remote</strong><p><br></p><strong>Required Skills:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Need 5+ years of strong experience in .NET 2.0 to 2.5</li><li>Expertise in Session Key Management, Side Scripting Issue, Single Sign On.</li><li>Proficient in C#, TSQL, ADO.NET, SQL Injections</li><li>Address, understand and fix security bugs (2-3 applications requires fixes)</li><li>Address security vulnerabilities</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Participate in requirements analysis</li><li>Collaborate with internal teams to produce software design and architecture</li><li>Write clean, scalable code using .NET programming languages</li><li>Test and deploy applications and systems</li><li>Revise, update, refactor and debug code</li><li>Improve existing software</li><li>Develop documentation throughout the software development life cycle (SDLC)</li><li>Serve as an expert on applications and provide technical support</li></ul>

title: Space TS/SCI - Sr. Principal Systems Engineer - Integration & Test (Up to $15K in sign-on bonus!)
description: About IMTCS Staffing Firm: IMTCS Staffing Firm is a leading provider of staffing and recruitment solutions, connecting talented professionals with top-notch companies across various industries. With our extensive network and expertise in matching skills and culture fit, we strive to deliver exceptional staffing solutions that drive growth and success for both our clients and candidates.<p><br></p>Responsibilities:<p><br></p><ul><li>Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications.</li><li>Designed, develop, and maintain responsive web applications using React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.</li><li>Implement and integrate RESTful APIs and backend services.</li><li>Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code following industry best practices.</li><li>Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure application functionality and performance.</li><li>Collaborate with UI/UX designers to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.</li><li>Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends, and propose innovative ideas to enhance development processes.</li></ul><p><br></p>Requirements:<p><br></p><ul><li>Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.</li><li>Proven experience as a Full Stack Engineer with expertise in React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.</li><li>Strong understanding of server-side technologies such as Node.js or Python.</li><li>Proficiency in working with databases (SQL and/or NoSQL) and integrating ORMs.</li><li>Familiarity with version control systems like Git.</li><li>Solid understanding of software development principles and agile methodologies.</li><li>Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.</li><li>Strong communication and collaboration abilities.</li></ul><p><br></p>Preferred:<p><br></p><ul><li>Familiarity with front-end frameworks such as Angular or Vue.js.</li><li>Knowledge of backend frameworks like Express.js or Django.</li><li>Experience working with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure.</li><li>Previous exposure to DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines.</li></ul>
